message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $4000, and I'll take $6000.
You're being too generous, I'll take more this time!
You wanted more, so I'll give you more. But I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm not backing down, I'll take the majority!
You're being too greedy, I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but that's as far as I'll go.
You're not being generous enough, I'll take what I can get
I'm not going to give you 9500, but I'll give you 9400. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, I'll take what I can get now
I'm not giving you 9800, I'm not giving you 9700 either. I'll give you 300 and that's it.
You're really lowballing me now, I'll take the last crumbs
